text: The Bust of Auguste Rodin was sculpted in 1888–89 by the French artist Camille Claudel as a tribute to her teacher and lover, Auguste Rodin. A bronze cast of the work was displayed in the 1892 Salon de la Société Nationale des Beaux–Arts on the Champ de Mars to critical acclaim. ==See also== *Bust of Auguste Rodin (Bourdelle) ==References== ==External links== Category:1889 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures Category:Sculptures by Camille Claudel
title: Bust of Auguste Rodin (Claudel)
